title: WTT: My T205 PSA 6 Lang for your Sovereign
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTT: My T205 PSA 6 Lang for your Sovereign
posts.post_content:
Anybody interested in my T205 Lang?  I am looking for T205/T206 Sovereigns in trade...condition isn't a big factor for me.

Take Care,
Geno
